price: Evo, ovo je Džehennem, koji su prestupnici poricali!
arabic: هَٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِي يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: hādhihi jahannamu allatī yukadhibu bihā al-muj'rimūna
